judges: Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree declining to grant an issue devisamt vel non dismissing the appeal from probate and confirming decree of probate is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Copeland at the cost of appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Paul W. Mahady, with him Thomas R. Mahady and Mahady & Mahady, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Kline Will.
Argued April 27, 1955.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
June 27,1955:
Emanuel Goldberg, for appellants.
Paul W. Mahady, with him Thomas R. Mahady and Mahady & Mahady, for appellees.
